TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ExpandCollapsePattern extends System.Windows.Automation.BasePattern

summary.span: 表示以視覺化方式展開來顯示內容和摺疊以隱藏內容的控制項。

span.span: Represents controls that visually expand to display content and collapse to hide content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 彙總控制項-以提供 UI 展開/摺疊功能的子物件建置 — 必須支援控制項模式，但不需要其子項目。Aggregate controls—built with child objects that provide the UI for expand/collapse functionality—must support the control pattern while their child elements do not. 例如，使用清單方塊、按鈕和編輯控制項組合所建置的下拉式方塊控制項，但是它只是必須支援 的父下拉式方塊。For example, a combo box control is built with a combination of list box, button, and edit controls, but it is only the parent combo box that must support the . > [!NOTE] > 功能表控制項，即使彙總的個別功能表項目，此規則的例外狀況。A menu control, even though an aggregate of individual menu items, is an exception to this rule. 功能表項目支援控制項模式，但是父功能表控制項並不會。The menu items support the control pattern, but the parent menu control does not. 樹狀結構和樹狀目錄項目控制項適用類似的例外狀況。A similar exception applies to the tree and tree item controls.

summary.span: 取得這個 的快取 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 屬性值。

span.span: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

value.span: 結構，包含控制項模式的快取 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 屬性值。

span.span: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 快取的屬性值必須已先前曾要求使用。Cached property values must have been previously requested using a . 使用取得屬性的目前值。Use to get the current value of a property. 如需可用的屬性和其使用資訊，請參閱。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

exception.span: 要求的屬性不在快取中。

span.span: The requested property is not in the cache.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Collapse() cil managed

summary.span: 隱藏 的所有子代節點、控制項，或內容。

span.span: Hides all descendant nodes, controls, or content of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是傳回的使用者介面自動化項目已摺疊之後封鎖方法。This is a blocking method that returns after the UI Automation element has been collapsed. 一些情況下會標示為分葉節點的使用者介面自動化項目可能不知道它是否有子系，直到或方法呼叫。There are cases when a UI Automation element that is marked as a leaf node might not know whether it has children until either the or the method is called. 此行為是在樹狀檢視控制項及其子項目的延遲載入。This behavior is possible with a tree view control that does delayed loading of its child items. 例如，[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winexpl](~/includes/tlasharptla-winexpl-md.md)]可能會顯示節點的展開圖示，即使目前沒有任何子項目; 按一下圖示時，控制項的子項目輪詢、 none、 尋找並移除的展開圖示。For example, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winexpl](~/includes/tlasharptla-winexpl-md.md)] might display the expand icon for a node even though there are currently no child items; when the icon is clicked, the control polls for child items, finds none, and removes the expand icon. 在這些情況下用戶端用來接聽屬性變更事件屬性註冊事件處理常式和方法。In these cases clients should listen for a property-changed event on the property by registering an event handler with the method. ## Examples 在下列範例中，表示功能表項目使用者介面自動化項目，會傳遞至函式嘗試，來展開或摺疊功能表項目，根據其目前的。In the following example, a UI Automation element representing a menu item is passed to a function that attempts to expand or collapse the menu item based on its current . [!code-csharp[UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip/CSharp/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip/CSharp/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snippets.vb#102)]

summary.span: 取得這個 的目前 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 屬性值。

span.span: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

value.span: 結構，包含控制項模式的目前 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 屬性值。

span.span: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模式必須從與參考，以取得目前的值。This pattern must be from an with an reference in order to get current values. 如果使用取得、 它只快取資料，包含，並嘗試取得任何屬性的目前值引發例外狀況。If the was obtained using , it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception. 使用取得先前使用指定之屬性的快取的值。Use to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a . 如需可用的屬性和其使用資訊，請參閱。For information on the properties available and their use, see .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Expand() cil managed

summary.span: 顯示 的所有子節點、控制項，或內容。

span.span: Displays all child nodes, controls, or content of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是封鎖方法之後，傳回已展開。This is a blocking method that returns after the has been expanded. 有案例時，標示為分葉節點可能不知道它是否有子系，直到或方法呼叫。There are cases when a that is marked as a leaf node might not know whether it has children until either the or the method is called. 此行為是在樹狀檢視控制項及其子項目的延遲載入。This behavior is possible with a tree view control that does delayed loading of its child items. 例如，[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winexpl](~/includes/tlasharptla-winexpl-md.md)]可能會顯示節點的展開圖示，即使目前沒有任何子項目; 按一下圖示時，控制項的子項目輪詢、 none、 尋找並移除的展開圖示。For example, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winexpl](~/includes/tlasharptla-winexpl-md.md)] might display the expand icon for a node even though there are currently no child items; when the icon is clicked, the control polls for child items, finds none, and removes the expand icon. 在這些情況下用戶端用來接聽屬性變更事件屬性註冊事件處理常式和方法。In these cases clients should listen for a property-changed event on the property by registering an event handler with the method. ## Examples 在下列範例中，表示功能表項目會傳遞至函式嘗試，來展開或摺疊功能表項目，根據其目前的。In the following example, an representing a menu item is passed to a function that attempts to expand or collapse the menu item based on its current . [!code-csharp[UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip/CSharp/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip/CSharp/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snippets.vb#102)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly ExpandCollapseStateProperty As AutomationProperty

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . 是指僅限直屬子物件的可見度，而非所有子系物件的可見度。 refers to the visibility of immediate child objects only; it does not refer to the visibility of all descendant objects. 預設值是 。The default value is . ## Examples 在下列範例中，根項目傳遞給函式傳回的集合[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]根的子代且符合一組屬性條件的項目。In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns a collection of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements that are descendants of the root and satisfy a set of property conditions. [!code-csharp[UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip/CSharp/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snippets.cs#100)] [!code-vb[UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snippets.vb#100)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Pattern As AutomationPattern

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者介面自動化用戶端應用程式會使用這個識別項。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自動化提供者應該使用中的對等欄位。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . 模式[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)]傳遞至方法，例如擷取感興趣之控制項模式，從指定。The pattern [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] is passed to methods such as to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified . ## Examples 在下列範例中，控制項模式取自使用者介面自動化項目。In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from a UI Automation element. [!code-csharp[UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip/CSharp/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAExpandCollapsePattern_snippets.vb#101)]
